ä¸¤æ•°ä¹‹å’Œ â€‹

  • é¢˜ç›® https://leetcode.cn/problems/two-sum/description/
  • è§£ç­” https://leetcode.cn/problems/two-sum/solutions/

æ–¹æ³•ä¸€ï¼šæš´åŠ›æšä¸¾

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(N2)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1)
å‚è€ƒç­”æ¡ˆ
js
/**
 * @param {number[]} nums
 * @param {number} target
 * @return {number[]}
 */
var twoSum = function (nums, target) {
    let result = []
    const l = nums.length
    for (let i = 0; i < l; i++) {
        for (let j = i + 1; j < l; j++) {
            if (nums[i] + nums[j] === target) {
                result = [i, j]
            }
        }
    }
    return result
};
python
class Solution:
    def twoSum(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> List[int]:
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n):
            for j in range(i + 1, n):
                if nums[i] + nums[j] == target:
                    return [i, j]
        
        return []

æ–¹æ³•äºŒï¼šå“ˆå¸Œè¡¨

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(N)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(N)
å‚è€ƒç­”æ¡ˆ
js
/**
 * @param {number[]} nums
 * @param {number} target
 * @return {number[]}
 */
var twoSum = function (nums, target) {
    let result = []
    let hashTable = new Map()
    for (let i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {
        if (hashTable.has(target - nums[i])) {
            result = [hashTable.get(target - nums[i]), i]
        }
        // hashçš„é”®ï¼šæ•°ç»„çš„å€¼ã€å€¼ï¼šæ•°ç»„çš„ä¸‹æ ‡
        hashTable.set(nums[i], i)
    }
    return result
};
python
class Solution:
    def twoSum(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> List[int]:
        hashtable = dict()
        for i, num in enumerate(nums):
            if target - num in hashtable:
                return [hashtable[target - num], i]
            hashtable[nums[i]] = i
        return []

ä¹°å–è‚¡ç¥¨çš„æœ€ä½³æ—¶æœº â€‹

  • é¢˜ç›® https://leetcode.cn/problems/best-time-to-buy-and-sell-stock/description/
  • è§£ç­” https://leetcode.cn/problems/best-time-to-buy-and-sell-stock/solutions/

æ–¹æ³•ä¸€ï¼šæš´åŠ›æ³•ã€è¶…æ—¶ã€‘

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(N2)ã€‚å¾ªç¯è¿è¡Œ n(nâˆ’1)/2æ¬¡ã€‚
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1)ã€‚åªä½¿ç”¨äº†å¸¸æ•°ä¸ªå˜é‡ã€‚
å‚è€ƒç­”æ¡ˆ
js
/**
 * @param {number[]} prices
 * @return {number}
 */
var maxProfit = function (prices) {
    let max = 0
    let l = prices.length
    for (let i = 0; i < l; i++) {
        for (let j = i + 1; j < l; j++) {
            if (prices[j] - prices[i] > max) {
                max = prices[j] - prices[i]
            }
        }
    }
    return max
};
python
# æ­¤æ–¹æ³•ä¼šè¶…æ—¶
class Solution:
    def maxProfit(self, prices: List[int]) -> int:
        ans = 0
        for i in range(len(prices)):
            for j in range(i + 1, len(prices)):
                ans = max(ans, prices[j] - prices[i])
        return ans

æ–¹æ³•äºŒï¼šä¸€æ¬¡éå†

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(N)ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦éå†ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(1)ã€‚åªä½¿ç”¨äº†å¸¸æ•°ä¸ªå˜é‡ã€‚
å‚è€ƒç­”æ¡ˆ
js
/**
 * @param {number[]} prices
 * @return {number}
 */
var maxProfit = function (prices) {
    let buyPrice = Infinity
    let max = 0
    for (let i = 0; i < prices.length; i++) {
        const price = prices[i]
        if (price < buyPrice) {
            buyPrice = price
        } else if (price - buyPrice > max) {
            max = price - buyPrice
        }
    }
    return max
};
python
class Solution:
    def maxProfit(self, prices: List[int]) -> int:
        minprice = int(1e9)
        maxprofit = 0
        for price in prices:
            maxprofit = max(price - minprice, maxprofit)
            minprice = min(price, minprice)
        return maxprofit
